hero.title: Almare Foundation Services
hero.subtitle: Specialized mental health and emotional wellness services to care for the mind and accompany the soul

workshops.title: Psychology workshops and educational programs
workshops.description: We conduct workshops and programs designed to educate and empower people in caring for their mental and emotional health, providing practical and reflective tools they can apply in their daily lives.

talks.title: Awareness talks and seminars
talks.description: We organize talks and seminars that seek to create safe spaces for learning, awareness, and dialogue about the importance of mental health and emotional well-being.

consulting.title: Comprehensive psychology consulting
consulting.description: We offer personalized professional guidance, addressing mental health comprehensively, helping each person find balance, understanding, and emotional well-being.

support.title: Individual and group psychological support services
support.description: We provide both individual and group psychological care, offering containment, active listening, and professional accompaniment so each person can express themselves freely and receive guidance in their emotional process.

holistic.title: Holistic guidance and occupational therapies
holistic.description: We facilitate comprehensive accompaniment that integrates body, mind, and emotions, promoting personal development and well-being through therapies and guidance adapted to each need.

information.title: Mental health information dissemination and provision
information.description: We make reliable and accessible information about psychology, emotional well-being, and self-care available, with the goal of educating, preventing, and empowering the community.

almareTeaProgram.description: Comprehensive wellness program that combines relaxation therapies, mindfulness, and therapeutic conversation in a warm and welcoming environment, using the tea ritual as a tool for connection and emotional healing.

cta.title: Need support or want to be part of the change?
cta.description: Contact us to access our mental health services or join as a volunteer to help others in their emotional well-being.
